title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs locally via a single CLI/API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with Promise-based API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async APIs for chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM, chat or embeddings backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent builder API and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list models with native Net::HTTP.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generation, embeddings and model operations.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team to use local models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Scripts to convert & quantize Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfile format.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI plugged to Ollama with Vercel deployment template.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to Ollama for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM commands on notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package of the Ollama JavaScript client (mirror of ollama-js repo).

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package of the Ollama Python client (mirror of ollama-python repo).

title: reddit/r/ollama - Model Discussion Thread
summary: Active community thread comparing Mistral 7B vs Mixtral 8×7B quantized performance in Ollama.
